name: Egg Mama
description:
In Egg Mama you play a bird who goal is to raise 3 chicks to win

Gather food and woof, Climb Trees Use wood to make nests and use food to lay eggs in nests

Protect your eggs long enough in their nests so that they’ll hatch and make chicks

avoid foxes or poo on them to keep them away from your chicks/eggs

Controls:

wasd or arrow keys to move

up arrow or down arrow to go up and down trees

“space” to fly (costs food) “n” to make nest (costs wood)

 “g” to poo on foxes

JAM GAME by Botyto (@botyto) , Yolwoocle (@yolwoocle) , Ardys (@ardys) , prixes (@prixes) , leokrechmer (@leokrechmer) , and Enver Arco (@enver-arco)
